item.description: yup, pretty awesome for long reports. If you have a report that has multiple tables in it you can set a document mpa name by hand as well.
item.content:encoded: yup, pretty awesome for long reports. If you have a report that has multiple tables in it you can set a document mpa name by hand as well.
